script: var ref; try { ref = window.parent.document.location.href; } catch (e) { ref = document.referrer; } var height; if (ref.indexOf('/www.') !== -1) { bodyClass = 'desktop'; height = '90px'; } else if (ref.indexOf('/m.') !== -1) { bodyClass = 'mobile'; height = '70px'; } else { bodyClass = 'mobile app'; height = '70px'; } document.body.className = bodyClass; try { window.parent.document.getElementById(window.frameElement.id).style.height = height; window.parent.document.getElementById(window.frameElement.id).style.width = '100%'; } catch (e) {}
